messages.subject: mail gone like water under the bridge
messages.msgSnippet: I can t keep all the water.  Darn it. Several times lately I ve been on Kirby s computer and when I wanted to save something I couldn t. There were two pieces
messages.messageBody:
I can't keep all the water. Darn it.
Several times lately I've been on Kirby's computer and when I wanted to save
something I couldn't.

There were two pieces of mail here in which people said they had come to this
list (or to unschooling) because they'd heard bad things about it (or me). I
had wanted to read them more slowly and comment, but they're gone.

If anyone was one of those people and remembers what day and subject, I can
go to the website and look or if it happens still to be in your outbox and you
remember to look, could you forward it to me on the side?

Thanks.

Sandra
